label: Saloon
tooltip: Dinette, main dining and social area

label: Sailing
tooltip: Green/Red/White masthead tri-color for use under sail

label: Motoring
tooltip: Green/Red bi-colour, stern and masthead lights for use when motoring

label: Diesel Heater
tooltip: Heater for engine, hot water and heating

label: Electric Heater
tooltip: Waterheater for hot water and heating

label: Gauges & Sensors
tooltip: Analogue and digital gauges, dials and signal converters

label: Cabin Sockets
tooltip: Electrical sockets in the Aft/Fore cabins

label: Starter Battery Charger
tooltip: Charge starter battery from AC Inverter/Generator

label: Shore Power
tooltip: Connect Shore power to AC Bus

label: Automatic overboard discharge
tooltip: Automatically discharge the holding tank overboard

label: Target RPM
tooltip: The RPM to target when automatically maintaining fixed RPM

name: Windlass
format: Windlass

name: Macerator Pump
format: Overboard Pump mi-delete_sweep

name: Bilge Pump 1
format: Bilge Pump #1 local_drink

name: Bilge Pump 2
format: Bilge Pump #2 local_drink {{msg.topic === 'countdown' ? msg.payload : '' }}

name: Stop Engine
format: Stop

name: Start Engine
format: Start

name: Horn
format: Horn

label: Fresh Water Pump
tooltip: Enable Pressure pump for fresh hot/cold water

name: Logo - Head - Template
format:
<style>
    /*
    Pre-defined colors
    */
    :root {
        --color-main-dark:  rgb(148,87,87,1);
        --color-main-light:  rgb(0,0,66,1);
        --color-main: var(--color-main-light);
        --color-text-light: rgba(12, 9, 62,1);
        --color-text-dark: rgb(254, 222, 222);
        --color-text: var(--color-text-light);
        --color-widget-border: rgb(84, 78, 78);
        --color-widget-trans: rgba(178, 178, 178, 0.2);
        --color-disabled: rgb(200, 200, 210);
        --color-button-light: rgba(5,16,60,0.8);
        --color-button-dark: rgba(54,16,16,0.8);
        --color-button: var(--color-button-light);
        --color-selection-light: rgba(100,100,155,1);
        --color-selection-dark: rgba(154,116,116,0.8);
        --color-selection: var(--color-selection-light);
        --color-tint-light: rgba(182, 182, 255,1);
        --color-tint-dark: rgba(255, 182, 182,1);
        --color-tint: var(--color-tint-light);
        --color-gauge-light: rgba(19,1,106,0.8);
        --color-gauge-dark: rgba(229,156,131,0.8);
        --color-gauge: var(--color-gauge-light);
        --color-background-primary-light: rgba(230,246,246,1);
        --color-background-secondary-light: rgba(188,212,217,0.5);
        --color-background-primary-dark: rgba(17,02,02,1);
        --color-background-secondary-dark: rgba(07,0,0,0.8);
        --color-background-primary: var(--color-background-primary-light);
        --color-background-secondary: var(--color-background-primary-light);
    }
    /*
    Various CSS segments borrowed from the Node Red forums and customized
    */
    .nr-dashboard-template {
        padding: 0px;
    }
    .masonry-container {
        position: relative;
        width: 100%;
        height:100%;
        margin: 0 auto;
        background: linear-gradient(180deg,  var(--color-background-primary) 0%, var(--color-background-secondary) 100%); 
    }
    .nr-dashboard-cardcontainer {
        position: relative;
        box-shadow: inset 0px 1px 4px 0px #000000bb;
        border-radius: 10px;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel {
        background-color: #33333300;
        color:var(--color-text);
        border-radius: 10px;
        box-shadow: 0 0 8px 0px #00000080;
    }
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {
        background-color: #33333300;
        color: var(--color-text);
        text-shadow: 4px 2px 4px #00000045;
        box-shadow: 0 -1px 5px 1px #00000045;
        border-radius: 10px;
        border: 1px solid var(--color-widget-border);
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
        color: var(--color-text);
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-gauge text {
        fill: var(--color-gauge);
        margin: 8px;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button  {
        display: inline-block;
        position: relative;
        cursor: pointer;
        min-height: 36px;
        min-width: 88px;
        line-height: 36px;
        vertical-align: middle;
        align-items: center;
        text-align: center;
        border-radius: 12px;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        -webkit-user-select: none;
        -moz-user-select: none;
        -ms-user-select: none;
        user-select: none;
        outline: none;
        border: 0;
        padding: 0 6px;
        margin: 6px 8px;
        background: transparent;
        color:var(--color-text);
        white-space: nowrap;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        font-weight: 500;
        font-size: 14px;
        font-style: inherit;
        font-variant: inherit;
        font-family: inherit;
        text-decoration: none;
        overflow: hidden;
        transition: box-shadow .4s cubic-bezier(.25,.8,.25,1),background-color .4s cubic-bezier(.25,.8,.25,1);
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-template .md-button:disabled {
        color: var(--color-disabled);
    }
    md-toolbar#toolbar{
        color: #ffffffff;
        background: linear-gradient(120deg, var(--color-main) 20%, var(--color-background-secondary) 100%); 
    }
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav {
        color: var(--color-text);
    }
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav {
        color: var(--color-text);
        background: linear-gradient(120deg, var(--color-main) 60%, var(--color-background-primary)); 
    }
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav div.md-list-item-inner {
        color: var(--color-background-secondary);
        background-color: transparent;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button {
        background-color: #88888800;
        color:var(--color-text);
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button:hover {
        background-color: #88888855;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-slider .md-track {
        background-color: var(--color-main);
    }
    md-slider .md-thumb {
        box-shadow: 0 0 10px 0px #101086;
    }    
    .nr-dashboard-slider .md-thumb:after {
        background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom right, var(--color-button), var(--color-tint));
        border-style: none;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-template ::-webkit-scrollbar {
        background-color: #666666;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-template ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
        background-color: var(--color-main);
    }
    md-switch .md-thumb {
        background-color: var(--color-main);
    }
    md-switch .md-bar {
        background-color: var(--color-background-secondary);
    }
    md-switch.md-checked:not([disabled]) .md-bar {
        background-color: var(--color-button) !important; 
    }
    md-switch.md-checked:not([disabled]) .md-thumb {
        background-color: var(--color-text) !important;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-numeric .value {
        background:unset;
        color:var(--color-text);
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option {
        background-color:  var(--color-background-primary);
        color: var(--color-text);
        height: 29px;
        border-radius: 10px;*/
        smargin-left: 10px;
        margin-right: 10px;
        margin-top: 2px;
        box-shadow: 0 0 6px 6px #24202133;
        transition: 0.3s;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-dropdown md-select .md-select-value, .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-dropdown md-select .md-select-value.md-select-placeholder {
        margin-top: -3px;
        border-color: var(--color-widget-border);
        color: var(--color-text);
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option[selected] {
        color: var(--color-text) !important;
        background-color: var(--color-background-primary) !important;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option:last-child {
        margin-bottom: 8px;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option:hover {
        background-color: var(--color-selection) !important;
        padding-left: 24px;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option .md-ripple-container{
        border-radius: 10px;
    }
</style>

<script id="headScript" type="text/javascript">
    /*
    Javascript to inject UI elements into the top of all dashboards (head)
    */
    var clockInterval;
    $(function () {
        if (clockInterval) return;

        //add logo
        var div0 = $('<div/>');
        var logo = new Image();
        if ( window.screen.width > 640 ) {
            logo.src = '/plugins/signalk-node-red/redAdmin/red/images/Boatcontrol_Logo.png'
        } else {
             logo.src = '/plugins/signalk-node-red/redAdmin/red/images/Boatcontrol_Logo_Small.png'
        }
        logo.height = 45;

        div0[0].style.margin = '10px auto';
        div0[0].style.width = '100px';
        div0[0].style.float = 'left';
        div0[0].style.align = 'center';
        div0.append(logo);
        
        
        //add clock
        var div1 = $('<div/>');
        var p = $('<p/>');

        div1.append(p);
        div1[0].style.margin = '5px';
        div1[0].style.width = '120px';
        div1[0].style.float = 'right';
        div0[0].style.align = 'right';

        function displayTime() {
            p.text(new Date().toLocaleTimeString());

        }
        
        p[0].style.fontFamily = "Ubuntu"
        p[0].style.fontSize = "x-large"
        p[0].style.fontWeight = "bold"
        
        //add day/night mode button
        var div2 = $('<div/>');
        var button = document.createElement('BUTTON');
        var html = document.getElementsByTagName('html')[0];
        var elem = window.getComputedStyle(html);
        var night_icon = document.createElement("night");
        var day_icon = document.createElement("day");
        day_icon.className ="fa fa-eye";
        night_icon.className ="fa fa-eye-slash";
        button.appendChild(night_icon);
        button.onclick = function(){
            button.replaceChild((button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? day_icon : night_icon, (button.firstChild.nodeName == "DAY") ? day_icon : night_icon);
     
            html.style.setProperty("--color-main",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? elem.getPropertyValue("--color-main-light") : elem.getPropertyValue("--color-main-dark"));
            html.style.setProperty("--color-text",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? elem.getPropertyValue("--color-text-light") : elem.getPropertyValue("--color-text-dark"));
            html.style.setProperty("--color-button",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? elem.getPropertyValue("--color-button-light") : elem.getPropertyValue("--color-button-dark"));
            html.style.setProperty("--color-gauge",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? elem.getPropertyValue("--color-gauge-light") : elem.getPropertyValue("--color-gauge-dark"));
            html.style.setProperty("--color-selection",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? elem.getPropertyValue("--color-selection-light") : elem.getPropertyValue("--color-selection-dark"));
            html.style.setProperty("--color-tint",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? elem.getPropertyValue("--color-tint-light") : elem.getPropertyValue("--color-tint-dark"));
            html.style.setProperty("--color-background-primary",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? elem.getPropertyValue("--color-background-primary-light") : elem.getPropertyValue("--color-background-primary-dark"));
            html.style.setProperty("--color-background-secondary",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? elem.getPropertyValue("--color-background-secondary-light") :elem.getPropertyValue("--color-background-secondary-dark"));
        }

        div2[0].style.margin = '5px auto';
        div2[0].style.width = '60px';
        div2[0].style.float = 'right';
        button.tooltip = 'Switch between night(dark) and day(light) themes';
        button.style.color = elem.getPropertyValue("--color-widget");
        button.style.background = elem.getPropertyValue("--color-widget-trans");
        button.style.borderRadius = '20%';
        div2.append(button);
        
        clockInterval = setInterval(displayTime, 1000);

        //add to toolbar when it's available
        var addToToolbarTimer;
        
        function addToToolbar() {
            var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
            
            if(!toolbar.length) return;
                toolbar.append(div0);
                // Only add clock on screens with enough width
               if (window.screen.width > 640) {
                    toolbar.append(div1);
                }
                toolbar.append(div2);
                clearInterval(addToToolbarTimer);
            }
        addToToolbarTimer = setInterval(addToToolbar, 100);
    });
</script>
